steps.name: I navigate to the signup page
I enter first name "Pradeep" and last name "Giri"
I enter a valid random email
I enter password "SecurePass@123" and "SecurePass@123"
I click the Create an Account button
I should see a success message "Thank you for registering with Main Website Store."
I navigate to the signup page
I enter first name "Pradeep" and last name "Giri"
I enter email "pradeep.giri@example.com"
I enter password "SecurePass123" and "SecurePass456"
I click the Create an Account button
I should see an error message "Please enter the same value again." on "Confirm Password"
I navigate to the signup page
I enter first name "Pradeep" and last name "Giri"
I enter email "test@test.com"
I enter password "SecurePass123" and "SecurePass123"
I click the Create an Account button
I should see an error message "There is already an account with this email address." on "Heading"
I navigate to the signup page
I enter first name "Pradeep" and last name "Giri"
I enter email "invalid-email"
I enter password "SecurePass123" and "SecurePass123"
I click the Create an Account button
I should see an error message "Please enter a valid email address" on "Email"
I navigate to the signup page
I enter first name "Pradeep" and last name "Giri"
I enter email "test123@test.com"
I enter password "abc" and "abc"
I click the Create an Account button
I should see an error message "Minimum length of this field must be equal or greater than 8 symbols" on "Password"
I navigate to the signup page
I enter first name "Pradeep" and last name "Giri"
I enter email "test123@test.com"
I enter password "abcdefghij" and "abcdefghij"
I click the Create an Account button
I should see an error message "Minimum of different classes of characters in password is 3. Classes of characters: Lower Case, Upper Case, Digits, Special Characters." on "Password"
I navigate to the signup page
I enter first name "" and last name "Giri"
I enter email "testghjhasd@example.com"
I enter password "SecurePass123" and "SecurePass123"
I click the Create an Account button
I should see an error message "This is a required field." on "First Name"
I navigate to the signup page
I enter first name "Pradeep" and last name ""
I enter email "testghjhasd@example.com"
I enter password "SecurePass123" and "SecurePass123"
I click the Create an Account button
I should see an error message "This is a required field." on "Last Name"
I navigate to the signup page
I enter first name "Pradeep" and last name "Giri"
I enter email ""
I enter password "SecurePass123" and "SecurePass123"
I click the Create an Account button
I should see an error message "This is a required field." on "Email"
I navigate to the signup page
I enter first name "Pradeep" and last name "Giri"
I enter email "testghjhasd@example.com"
I enter password "" and "SecurePass123"
I click the Create an Account button
I should see an error message "This is a required field." on "Password"
I navigate to the signup page
I enter first name "Pradeep" and last name "Giri"
I enter email "testghjhasd@example.com"
I enter password "SecurePass123" and ""
I click the Create an Account button
I should see an error message "This is a required field." on "Confirm Password"
I navigate to the login page
I enter valid email and password "SecurePass@123"
I click the login button
Verify user is logged in successfully
I navigate to the login page
I enter email "invalid@test.com" and password "Secure123"
I click the login button
I should see login error message "The account sign-in was incorrect or your account is disabled temporarily. Please wait and try again later." on "Heading"
I navigate to the login page
I enter email "test@test.com" and password "WrongPass"
I click the login button
I should see login error message "The account sign-in was incorrect or your account is disabled temporarily. Please wait and try again later." on "Heading"
I navigate to the login page
I enter email "wrong@test.com" and password "WrongPass"
I click the login button
I should see login error message "The account sign-in was incorrect or your account is disabled temporarily. Please wait and try again later." on "Heading"
